title.jp: A Ninja's Rival is Another Ninja

synopsis: The boys' school burns down, and the kunoichi suspect foul play. Himawari is kidnapped, and the others rush to save her.

title.jp: If You Eat Plants, With It Comes Poison As Well

synopsis: Shikimi discovers an odd plant in the forest moments before she is attacked, and she thinks Nanafushi is responsible. The truth about what happened at the boys' school is revealed, and an odd phenomenon takes over Shikimi and Hayato.

title.jp: Knives Aren't Needed for Killing Men

synopsis: An "eerie-looking monster" is spotted right before the shop is destroyed. A new teacher arrives at the school, and she may be as dangerous as she is beautiful.

title.jp: Theres a Fine Line Between Attack and Defense

synopsis: The organization sends another sinister device: micro-ninjas. And this time, they're after Himeji. Once again, by following the urges of his stomach, Hayato finds himself in a predicament.
The girls discover where the enemy hideout is located. Azami infiltrates it and uncovers valuable information. Hayato discovers Takechi's true face, and it shocks everyone.

title.jp: Alternative? The Bonds of Fate between Master and Servant

synopsis: School is called off indefinitely. Tsubaki returns and is attacked by Takechi. Himawari saves her; when she recovers, Tsubaki reveals the reason she has returned: she intends to marry Hayato in order to preserve her blood line, and she must first duel Himawari to win the right to do so.

title.jp: Bewildered and Perplexed; Surrounded by Enemies

synopsis: The danger is more imminent than ever, yet all Hayato remains concerned with is his stomach. Takechi reveals his latest sinister plan: to control the townspeople since the girls wonâ€™t attack them.

title.jp: The Moonlit Forest is Full of Dangers

synopsis: The enemy attacks the village, but, thanks to Nanafushi's warning, the girls are able to escape. They seek refuge in the forest. Hayato suggests that Himawari return home to her granny and save herself, but she refuses to leave her friends.

The girls rummage through the ruins of the Academy to find anything useful. Hayato's friend--the one who caused his immense debt--calls again asking to borrow more money. Hayato and Himawari are sought by their enemies. Just as they think they're trapped, the girls show up to rescue them.

Himawari returns to her village to visit her granny. She struggles to remember her past, but can't distinguish between authentic and imagined memories. Her granny finally reveals the truth about Himawari's past, along with Takechi's connection to it.

title.jp: A Past of Secrecy is a Tricky Pattern

synopsis: Shikimi is unusually impatient. The girls are captured by the enemy. Hayato and Himawari are attacked in the woods.

title.jp: Rescue! Friends of Shinobi Go Through Thick and Thin Together

synopsis: Himawari and Hayato head back to the Village of Mist to save their friends. The girls use all of their techniques to outsmart their captors. Shikimi is captured and is the first in line to be altered.

title.jp: Final Battle! Master and Servant's Eternal Vows

synopsis: The kunoichi show up to save Shikimi, but it might be too late. Takechi shows up to save Himawari and Hayato when it seems hopeless. The girls go on to live out their dreams.
